name: React-language-selector
tagline: A React.js Language Selector written originally for the BitShares POS systems.
body:
# React Language Selector This is the langpack picker/switcher that will be used in all BitShares POS systems. It's written in React.js with JSON (no more jquery!). Please vote, it helps me fund these apps!
Open BitShares wallet > Advanced > Console: approve delegate.kencode true 
Demo
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
